text:
@realDonaldTrump How many REPUBLICAN BLACK SENATORS are there?!
I believe there's ONE... TIM SCOTT.  How many of your CABINET are BLACK or for that matter ANY MINORITY.  GOT ANY HISPANICS?... WOMEN?... LGBT?   
#COVID19 #SundayMorning 
#BlueLivesMatter 
STOP LYING...YOU ARE RACIST!!!
